page.title: 18A SHOPKEEPER
page.content: { 08.00} Woken by Severnsound on radio alarm.{08.50}with brother take down shop window shutters and put the more valuable items on display from the safes.{09.00}The shop is open for business,switch on the citizens band radio in the workshop to the emergency channel which I monitor on behalf of Tewkesbury REACT. My responsibility is for the assembly,sales and engraving of sports trophies.{13.10-14.00}Home for snack lunch.{14.00-17.30}Complete the batch of trophies started in the morning.{17.30-17.50}Put up window shutters and check the security for night, then home for a cooked meal and a short break.{18.50-20.00}Check over the public address system for use at Fun Day tomorrow.{20.00-midnight} Signed on as Duty Monitor on citizens band radio then bed.
